hanzi-su-wiki:
製

Значения

Изготовление, обработка; изготовлять, производить

Мнемоника

Шитье одежды 衣 требует строгого контроля 制, от которого зависит качество готового изделия.

Варианты

制

для производства; сделать

heisig_chinese_memo: Manufactured in... china - a system of exploitation. Making garments for nothing.
heisig_constituent: made in…, system, cow, belt, sword, sabre, saber, hat, scarf, cloth, clothes, clothing, garment
heisig_story: A label indicating that a garment was made in U.S.A. or Taiwan or Japan is itself a symbol for the systematization of the garment industry.
koohiiStory1: Made in china - a system of exploitation . making garments for nothing.
koohiiStory2: A SYSTEMATICALLY made GARMENT will no doubt have MADE IN on the label.
jp_example_words:
製(せい): -made, make
製鉄(せいてつ): iron manufacture
製法(せいほう): manufacturing method, recipe, formula
作製(さくせい): manufacture
製作(せいさく): manufacture, production
製造(せいぞう): manufacture, production
製品(せいひん): manufactured goods
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: In an attempt to control your clothes, you manufacture a mind control device. This mind control device will allow you to control the mind of your clothes and all that they do. You just need to manufacture it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine being able to control your clothes with your mind. What would you have them do? Imagine what you would do with your clothes if you could manufacture something to control them and move them around at will with your mind.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You manufacture these clothes to control your saber (せい). It's hard to manufacture, you have to do a lot of work, but you manage to make your clothes control your saber. Now you don't need to rely on your hands!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Now you're trying to manufacture a machine that will make sabers and clothes you can use to control them. Soon you'll have a manufactured army of saber-controlling clothes!
Ru_Radicals: 刈 (косить), 巾 (тряпка), 牛 (корова), 衣 (одежда)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: there's a system (制) for clothes (衣) manufacturing
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Manufactured in... china - a system of exploitation. Making garments for nothing.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " clothing " to " making " sound, the original meaning is tailoring. "Shuowen": "Care from clothes. From the clothes to the system." "Zuo Zhuan‧ The 31st Year of Xianggong": "There are beautiful brocades in the child, and it doesn't make people learn the system."

" Made " can mean the style and shape of clothes. "Han Shu‧ Shusun Tong Biography": "Through Confucianism clothing, the Han king hates it. It is to change his clothing, dress short clothes, Chu system, Han Wang Xi." Yan Shi's ancient note: "The system is the form of tailoring."

" Making " also means making utensils. "The Book of the Later Han·Fan Hong Biography": "If the grains are not climbed, it is called a great invasion. The ritual of a great invasion is that a hundred officials are prepared but not controlled, and a group of gods pray without shrines." Li Xian's note: "Official positions are prepared without pretentiousness."

" System " also means writing and writing. Han Caiyan "Eighteen Beats in Hu Jia": "The eight beats are made to eliminate worries. How can you know that the song will turn your heart into worry."

The written works and works are also called " systems ." "Song Shu-Xie Lingyun Biography": "The first Shimao system, satirize Gaoli reward."

Refining traditional Chinese medicines by fire-fried methods is also called " making ." Ming Li Shizhen’s "Compendium of Materia Medica-Preface": "Pharmaceuticals are expensive in moderation...Milk is used to moisturize the withered and produce blood, and honey is made of sweet and beneficial elements."

" System " can also be used as a measure word to indicate the unit of measurement of clothing materials. Liu Xiang of the Han Dynasty "Shuoyuan·Fuen": "Wu Chi, an envoy from the city of Yu Zhi, pretended to be in Wei. Ning Wenzi has a three-hundred system of 纻絺絺絺絺三百, and will give it away."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " clothing " and " making ", the original meaning is tailoring.
humanum_full_description:
從「衣」，「制」聲，本義為剪裁。《說文》：「裁也。从衣从制。」 《左傳‧襄公三十一年》：「子有美錦，不使人學製焉。」杜預注：「製，裁也。

　　「製」可表示衣服的式樣、形制。《漢書‧叔孫通傳》：「通儒服，漢王憎之。乃變其服，服短衣，楚製，漢王喜。」顏師古注：「製，謂裁衣之形製。」

　　「製」也表示製作器物。《後漢書‧樊宏傳》：「五穀不登，謂之大侵。大侵之禮，百官備而不製，群神禱而不祠。」李賢注：「官職備列，不造作也。」

　　「製」還表示撰寫，著述。漢蔡琰〈胡笳十八拍〉：「製茲八拍兮擬排憂，何知曲成兮心轉愁。」

　　撰寫出來的著作、作品也稱為「製」。《宋書‧謝靈運傳》：「先士茂製，諷高歷賞。」

　　用炮炒等法煉成中藥也叫做「製」。明李時珍《本草綱目‧序例》：「製藥貴在適中……乳製潤枯生血，蜜製甘緩益元。」

　　「製」還可用作量詞，表示衣料計量單位。漢劉向《說苑‧復恩》：「吳赤市使於智氏，假道於衛。寧文子具紵絺三百製，將以送之。」

  • city 市 people 𠂉 using a knife 刂 (制) for making clothes 衣
 辟 囚; 作

Chinese Definition:

  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 制 [ zhì ] system; to establish; to manufacture; to overpower
    • 衣 [ yī ] cloth; clothes, apparel; dress, coat
①規定：因地制宜。制定。制式。制憲。
②限定，約束，管束：制止。制裁。專制。制約。抵制。節制。制動。制海權。
③法規，制度：民主集中制。公有制。
④依照規定的標準做的：制錢(中國明、清兩代稱本朝的銅錢)。制服。
⑤古代帝王的命令：制誥。
⑥古代父母死亡守喪；守制。
⑦造，作：製造。製做。製品。製圖。製革。製版。如法炮(páo)制。

從「 衣 」，「 制 」聲，本義為剪裁。《說文》：「裁也。从衣从制。」 《左傳‧襄公三十一年》：「子有美錦，不使人學製焉。」杜預注：「製，裁也。 「 製 」可表示衣服的式樣、形制。《漢書‧叔孫通傳》：「通儒服，漢王憎之。乃變其服，服短衣，楚製，漢王喜。」顏師古注：「製，謂裁衣之形製。」 「 製 」也表示製作器物。《後漢書‧樊宏傳》：「五穀不登，謂之大侵。大侵之禮，百官備而不製，群神禱而不祠。」李賢注：「官職備列，不造作也。」 「 製 」還表示撰寫，著述。漢蔡琰〈胡笳十八拍〉：「製茲八拍兮擬排憂，何知曲成兮心轉愁。」 撰寫出來的著作、作品也稱為「 製 」。《宋書‧謝靈運傳》：「先士茂製，諷高歷賞。」 用炮炒等法煉成中藥也叫做「 製 」。明李時珍《本草綱目‧序例》：「製藥貴在適中……乳製潤枯生血，蜜製甘緩益元。」 「 製 」還可用作量詞，表示衣料計量單位。漢劉向《說苑‧復恩》：「吳赤市使於智氏，假道於衛。寧文子具紵絺三百製，將以送之。」

製字的基本解释

製
zhì
见“制”⑦。

製字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》征例切，去祭，章。］
(1)裁衣。
(2)衣服的形制；式样。
(3)衣裳。
(4)雨衣。若今斗篷。
(5)造作；制造，制作。
(6)指制作的方法、式样。
(7)撰写，著述。
(8)指著作、作品。
(9)用炮炒等法炼成中药。
(10)制裁；约束；控制。
(11)量词。衣料计量单位。
(12)用同“致”。意态。

製字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　製； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1119第20
【唐韻】【集韻】?征例切，音制。【說文】裁也。【左傳·襄三十一年】子有美錦，不使人學製焉。　又裘也。【左傳·定九年】晳幘而衣貍製。　又【六書正譌】雨衣也。　又造也。【後漢·樊準傳】上疏言大侵之禮，百官備而不製。　又式也。【前漢·叔孫通傳】通儒服，漢王憎之，廼變其服，服短衣，楚製。【師古註】謂裁衣之形製。　又與致同。【唐書·張易之傳】易之旣冠，頎皙美姿製。　又義與著同。【杜甫詩】聲華當健筆，灑落富淸製。

考證：〔【左傳·襄三十一年】雖有美錦。〕　謹照原文雖改子。

[①]［zhì］
["Guangyun" case cut, go to sacrifice, chapter. ]
(1) Tailoring.
(2) The shape and style of clothes.
(3) Clothes.
(4) Raincoat. Ruo Jin cloak.
(5) Fabrication; manufacture, manufacture.
(6) Refers to the method and style of production.
(7) Writing and writing.
(8) Refers to works and works.
(9) The traditional Chinese medicine is refined by methods such as stir-frying.
(10) Sanctions; restraints; control.
(11) Quantifiers. The unit of measurement for clothing.
(12) Use the same "to". Attitude.

zhì
вм. 制
Radicals: 制, 衣  (control, clothes)
Meaning Mnemonic
In an attempt to control your clothes, you manufacture a mind control device. This mind control device will allow you to control the mind of your clothes and all that they do. You just need to manufacture it.
Imagine being able to control your clothes with your mind. What would you have them do? Imagine what you would do with your clothes if you could manufacture something to control them and move them around at will with your mind.
Reading Mnemonic
You manufacture these clothes to control your saber (せい). It's hard to manufacture, you have to do a lot of work, but you manage to make your clothes control your saber. Now you don't need to rely on your hands!
Now you're trying to manufacture a machine that will make sabers and clothes you can use to control them. Soon you'll have a manufactured army of saber-controlling clothes!
